Service Details: Assists local individuals and families who are in temporary financial difficulty and are in need of food * offers additional programs that include Tiny Bundles  and the Kids Snack Pack ProgramTO RECEIVE FOOD ASSISTANCE IN WEST KELOWNAEveryone Welcome:- Wed: 5:30pm - 7:30pm - Thu: 9:30am - 11:15amTiny Bundles (weekly for pregnant women or families with a baby under 1 yr old):- Thu: 12:30pm - 1:30pmBakery Items and Buns:- Mon-Fri: 9:00am - 4:00pm (located in outside freezer)
How to Apply: Please call or email our office for additional information and to apply to receive a hamper
